titles.title: Commending the member states of the United Nations Western European and Others Group for addressing over four decades of injustice and extending temporary membership in that regional bloc to the state of Israel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

bill.summary: 6/8/2000--Introduced. Commends the members of Western European and Other Group (WEOG) at the United Nations for extending temporary membership to Israel. Congratulates Israel on its new-found role in the UN. Reaffirms Israel's right to be a full participating member and equal partner in the UN. Urges WEOG members to extend full and permanent membership to Israel, without conditions, until such time as Israel can serve as an effective member of the Asian States Group.
